website_summaries.verdict: Despite some issues that are common to this type of case, this model offers a durable build and reliable protection with fewer complaints than others in its class.
pros: Offers waterproof protection for some of the latest iPhones (7 and 8 Plus) in a slim, fairly lightweight design
Protects for up to 2 hours in water as deep as 10 feet
cons: Some owner complaints about being told they sound muffled or tinny with the case on their phones

customer_reviews.title: Whale Shark Snorkeling
customer_reviews.text: Bought this case for a trip to Mexico to swim with whale sharks, protected my phone with no leaks!! Love this case
customer_reviews.author: Sierra Marlborough

customer_reviews.title: Tested in the waters of Hawaii and the Yuba River
customer_reviews.text: I've had 2-3 of these protectors from various brands. This was the one. The screen was sensitive enough to use while awaiting bigger waves to surf on the beaches of Waikiki. Durable enough when I jumped off boulders and into deep water in Yuba River. Just make sure you take if off during regular use and only put it on during your water adventures. Otherwise, the daily grinding, bumping, wear and tear will make it weak and vulnerable. Be picky when you use it and don't use it as your 'daily driver' and this will make you happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Jasper Pugao

customer_reviews.title: This case is great
customer_reviews.text: I just got this case and I like it alot it’s slim and easy to grip and it’s not expensive and it’s preforms just as well as the $80 life proof case that I bought
customer_reviews.author: Derrick

customer_reviews.title: iPhone 7 Plus Waterproof case
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly for what I needed it for. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Flores

customer_reviews.title: Best Case for my iPhone 7plus yet!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, passed water test, and unless holding phone with shoulder no problem with others hearing me or me them! Sounds crystal clear! New charger fits when other cases it would not! I researched online and on Amazon for hours/days before choosing this case and I am so happy I did! The product seller even contacted me via email to thank me and offer free gift!!!! Will definitely order again!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: This product is useless. I tried it for 24 hours and for some reason, it caused the quality of my phone calls to go to absolute crap. Whomever I was on the phone with only heard intense crackling sounds when I tried to speak. Additionally, the seller sent an email saying they'd include a waterproof pouch as a "thanks for my support" once I "shared my good experience with other customers." I bought this because of the low cost and great reviews but it turns out they can't be trusted I suppose.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: this $20 case is not worth your time or money
customer_reviews.text: This case does not work well with the I phone 8 plus. The phones sound is muffled while in this case and the silent switch upper left side stays in the off position once the phone is placed into this case. The case is hard and uncomfortable to use and handle. The design missed the mark for 8 plus application. I removed it from the case and placed it back into my Otterbox that is very worn and dilapidated for safety’s sake. You get What you pay for in this $20 case is not worth your time or money
customer_reviews.author: Shud hav known

customer_reviews.title: By far the best phone case I have ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is sturdy and definitely waterproof. Works just as well if not better than a LifeProof case - save your money. I owned 3 LifeProof cases before this and they always slowly fell apart but I always wanted the waterproof protection. The only downside is the wheel to turn on/off the silent mode is a little tough but not that huge of a deal to me as I rarely change this setting. I will be buying these cases again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Vincent

customer_reviews.title: The waterproofness
customer_reviews.text: It’s an amazing product! I tested the waterproof with paper in it and the paper was dry and I kept it in the water for 2 hours like it said in the description and it was amazing so I put my phone in it and it worked perfectly only thing is when I put my phone underwater with the case the touch screen wont work but it does work when I take it out of the water but other then that it works perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Isabella

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with iPhone
customer_reviews.text: This product clearly says that it is compatible with iPhones but it is not. For reasons unknown, there is a little dial next to the mute button on the iPhone. As most iPhone users no, there is no dialing option for muting your phone. Super confused as to why that would be on the case and still advertised as an iPhone case. Other than that, it did appear to be a durable case, however since I have an iPhone it’s of zero used to me.
customer_reviews.author: CTMom814

customer_reviews.title: Great company, great product.
customer_reviews.text: The first case did not seal well, but to my surprise, the company got ahold of me first to see how the case was doing. They themselves offered to send a replacement to replace the one not working. I got it a few days later and it works great. I'm in a wheelchair and am a little hard on my phones. This case however can take a beating. I've stopped my phone a couple times and this case kept right up. Pay attention to how you put it together and be sure to do the water test first. But after that, you will be very happy with this case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy name brand for warranty
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has had this case for a week and she dropped her phone yesterday and the screen cracked . When you spend money to get a name brand case you also get a warranty on it in case your phone breaks ~ my mistake for not checking if this one did. No insurance on phone so now costing more to get fixed then it would go to get expensive case ;(
customer_reviews.author: jim Carter

customer_reviews.title: Professional pool cleaner preferred!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a professional pool cleaner, and I manage lifeguards for 150 houston pools: this case is waterproof, and it allows me to use my device whilst working. It keeps my iphone 8 Plus safe from water, drops and sand/ dirt. This is the second I've purchased, because the screen will get scuffed after a year. Other than the screen becoming scuffed (it's plastic), this case will last as long as the seals do-- which I'm assuming is the life of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Slaight

customer_reviews.title: Super skeptical but IT WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: I was super skeptical even after I tested it and was about to use it for the first time. The thought of submerging my iPhone into the Carribbean ocean made my stomach turn, but I did it and was thoroughly impressed! The quality of the pictures and video were much clearer than I had ever gotten from on of those toss away underwater cameras. I just wish i had used it earlier on my vacation so I could have gotten more use of it.
customer_reviews.author: rebecca prince

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, clean look, screen is beautiful. Better than Lifeproof.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know about durability, but I’m very happy with it right now. I paid nearly $70 for a Lifeproof box which wilted away, yes it protected my phone for a year, but slowly started to become loose and lost one of the seals over the camera. No luck in getting them to replace it. This OTBBA box also produces a nicer screen view, and I feel more secure in that is sealed ... Even more so, than when I purchased the original Lifeproof case.
customer_reviews.author: Domain Earth

customer_reviews.title: Honestly terrible case. You can’t hear the speaker or talk ...
customer_reviews.text: Junk. Honestly terrible case. You can’t hear the speaker or talk on it. Also the rubber band seal broke a couple days in. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: logan greeno

customer_reviews.title: MICROPHONE MUFFLED
customer_reviews.text: If you want someone to hear you when you call them, then this case is not for you.
customer_reviews.author: mark scott

customer_reviews.title: 3 foot drop
customer_reviews.text: This was disappointing , in a few days phone dropped from my desk and boom , screen shattered. They claim it can take falls up to 6.5 feet but that wasn't the case. Contacted seller and the only thing the are willing to do is refund the case, there is no warranty on their claim that it can withstand falls. They say "every dangerous situation is subject to a number of different hazards, some of which are beyond our control, and we cannot guarantee that absolutely all exposure to risk is eliminated through the use of our products". Come on first drop from a desk
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Case is junk. Volume down button will not function with case put together. Knob to switch between silent and audible mode broke within two turns. Fingerprint reader did work well, though. Buy a Lifeproof and dont waste your money on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Idaho knife crazy

customer_reviews.title: Get it
customer_reviews.text: This case is amazing very waterproof!!! i have a great video if only I could figure out of to add to review
customer_reviews.author: Mo4ya

customer_reviews.title: I regret my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I’m so frustrated with this case. My phone fell from not that high and the screen cracked, the protective glass didn’t but the actual screen cracked. This case muffles your speaker and makes it hard for the person on the other end to hear you. Also, it distorts any pictures you want to take. The thumb print doesn’t want to read your thumb and the screen makes it hard to type.
customer_reviews.author: Josh and Crystal

customer_reviews.title: People can’t hear you
customer_reviews.text: Good case except people I talk to have problems understanding and hearing me. I take the phone out of the case and they can hear me or on my Bluetooth and air buds communications are fine. I have dropped and it’s been in the rain. It’s a good case when I’m in the car. It’s a hassle when I get a call and say please hold on while I get my headset on.
customer_reviews.author: Pevalina

customer_reviews.title: Easy on, clear back let’s phone color show- The ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy on, clear back let’s phone color show- The button to silence the phone is a little awkward. All other functions work great. Good sound. A little larger than the life proof fre- update-dropped my rating - the button for the sound on/ off is awkward and has already broken off rendering the case no longer waterproof. I have only had 1 it for week! I’m going back to life proof fre
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get this case!
customer_reviews.text: This works so good...it's flawless and overall a beautiful case. I kept it in water doing the paper test for a full two hours and not a drop of water got inside. I was very surprised...The cost is amazing for something that works so well. The sound was really good. I was heard by all and I could hear everyone. The strap is really durable as well. I would definitely suggest getting this case. I've used this with my phone as well and it's really airtight. Doesn't let a drop of water in. Get this case!
customer_reviews.author: Dynasti

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for the Money!
customer_reviews.text: My last two phone cases were Lifeproof Waterproof cases. I silence my phone often because I am in meetings off and on during the day. The Sound on/Silence button came apart on both cases within 18 months. I was concerned that the waterproof aspect of the case was compromised so replaced the first case. This time I replaced the Lifeproof case with OTBBA case. It is less expensive than the Lifeproof case and seems of comparable protection and quality. Installation was not difficult. The only "con" I have is that the flap over the charging port makes plugging in the power cord awkward. For the savings, I'll put up with the minor inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: N. Vickers

customer_reviews.title: Very good protection but....
customer_reviews.text: This is a great case and it gives the phone outstanding protection. My only qualm is I had a privacy screen that I had to get rid of because this case doesn’t compensate for any accessories. So I wish they had a privacy screen version. I’d pay extra for it if it were an option.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Williams

customer_reviews.title: Kept my phone totally dry while shooting video underwater in Maui
customer_reviews.text: Totally worked for me in Hawaii. I lost my GoPro in Maui so I used my iPhone underwater in this case and it worked like a charm. Not too bulky, way better than the ziplock bag types I’ve used before. I could use my phone at the beach too, without worrying about sand. But underwater is the coolest. This way I didn’t have to transfer all the videos from the GoPro, they were already on my phone. The case doesn’t float, so don’t drop your phone or it will sink to the bottom. The wrist strap is great, but I don’t know if i’d bet my phone’s life on it.
customer_reviews.author: printist

customer_reviews.title: Solid case
customer_reviews.text: Case is as advertised. Solid case, will make your phone more bulky. So if your looking for something slim this is not it. Covers all ports very well.Touch screen works great with the built in screen protector no issue. Only issue I have is the turn dial for the silent button. Mine was a bit hard to turn but otherwise great case.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Bulley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Sailing
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for sailing or frankly any environment you are planning on getting wet. I bought this to replace a different brand which had started to fail. I have been nothing but impressed. East to put on and take off if needed. Comes with a lanyard that fits over my hand so I don't drop it into the ocean. Easy to read through. The back is clear which is an added bonus as I can put my monthly train ticket to see through. Never forget your phone!!! Great job, and I have now bought four for all the family.
customer_reviews.author: Brett the Jet

customer_reviews.title: Product is durable and solid!!
customer_reviews.text: Case is just the same if not better than the lifeproof series. I have 2 lifeproof cases that cost triple the price and this is the same. I purposely put the case in the pool with my iphone 8 plus for 10 min in 3.5 feet of water at the bottom and no issues after. I plan on buying another one for my daughters iphone as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this case. I had a previously owned another waterproof case from another brand. It worked great but was not light weight and after a few months, where the strap id located broke. I love that this case is light weight and not bulky. I love that it has a strap and that was important to me. I am always on the go and having the strap is quick and grab. Sometimes I don't always wear clothing with pockets. Great case.
customer_reviews.author: acriherrera

customer_reviews.title: Protected Phone While Swimming In Ocean
customer_reviews.text: I primarily got this for the use on vacations where I would be swimming and wanted to take underwater photos. This protected my phone, keeping it completely dry and also worked for taking picturess and shooting video underwater. It responded to my touch on the screen perfectly. When underwater, it did sometimes switch to a different setting within the camera, but I was able to take a lot of really great underwater photos with my iPhone. I also have not had any trouble either hearing or being heard when talking on the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Gladhill

customer_reviews.title: Bubble?
customer_reviews.text: It is waterproof. Fully tested. But the back of the case seems to rise off of the phone? Distancing itself from the camerawhile putting a lot of pressure on the screen. I've had waterproof cases before, and their main problem was that the camera cover was to close to the camera itself so if It was under the water for to long it would fog up. So i guess this feature prevents that in this case. And buts more pressure on the screen so it can feel your touch underwater unlike other cases. The rising back just concerns me a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Northcutt

customer_reviews.title: Not durable.
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this 0 stars I would. The charger doesn’t fit with the case on so you need to remove it between charges. It’s also very flimsy. I returned it instantly.
customer_reviews.author: Sara K

customer_reviews.title: Cheap good simple
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I work construction and I was getting tired of having sand in my phone. I had a otter box it worked great for a case but I needed something that I couldn’t get from any ordinary otter box. So I bought this case and I was not disappointed what so ever. I really like the twist knob for the silent switch. It didn’t leak after the test. So far I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Randall S.

customer_reviews.title: Not for every day use due to muffled sound
customer_reviews.text: This case is definitely water proof. I did the 30 minute paper test and it was totally dry. HOWEVER, this case is not something I could leave on my phone for every day use. It muffled the sound of all videos I am trying to take even when I am feet away from the person speaking. My husband said I sound muffled like I’m going through a tunnel when I talk to him. If you just need something for the pool, this is for you. If you want an all day every day case... keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: EMGMom

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Plastic covering home button tore rendering it not waterproof anymore. I’ve had it for 1 week. It should last longer than a week. Don’t waste your money. Put it towards a better case that will be more durable.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Better than what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t want to spend a lot on a phone case. I have dropped it and placed it in a bucket of water no leaks. The fingerprints is not to bad and people can hear me fine, as far as hearing the caller voice somewhat low it is to be expected it is sealed and get over it use a bluetooth. Overall, it does what is advertised, price is good and I recommend this case.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Great price for waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased this case recently. So far so good. It's easy to put on and the touch screen works perfectly. I've always hade Lifeproof, but they are so expensive. For the price, you really cant beat what you get. The only drawback is the little dial you have to turn for silent mode. It can be a little tough to turn, but still worth the price! I'd also like to have more color choices!
customer_reviews.author: Barbh

customer_reviews.title: Poor Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: Case is nice, but sound quality is horrible. With volume turned up, can barely hear from the ear speaker. Have to change to speaker when on calls and hold near ear. When on speaker or watching videos, can barely hear with volume all the way up. I have tested with and without the case and the issue is definitely the case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You can’t hear and people can’t hear you on calls!
customer_reviews.text: Case seems to protect the phone ok but I have the volume all the way up and I can hardly hear when making calls and not any better if I put the caller on speaker. Everyone says they can hardly hear me on the phone too. Wanted to like this case with the other positive ratings and cheaper price then other waterproof cases but I just wasted my money because now I’m just going to buy one of the more reputable brands. I’m always looking for a good deal but unfortunately this was NOT a deal at all. Phone case is good as long as you don’t plan on talking or making any calls with your phone. VERY disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: THERESA

customer_reviews.title: Amazing case
customer_reviews.text: Very durable case, I’ve dropped my phone multiple times, sometimes I’ve even thrown it and this case has not let me down. My only real complaint is that sometimes my friends can’t hear me over the phone and also the thin film that covers the home button needs better glue because mine came off so now I can’t enjoy full water resistance. However with that said, this case has been really good to me and never let me down, I took it off for the first time in forever and my phone looks brand new!
customer_reviews.author: Francisco H.

customer_reviews.title: Rugged compact protection
customer_reviews.text: I am on my 3rd case with the same phone, not quite a year per case, and my phone looks brand new! I used to use the bulkier otterbox defenders, but like this one much better. I'm shocked at how much this sleek case protects my phone. I was at a friends house and forgot my phone on the side of his truck box. We then left and when we got where we were going I couldn't find my phone. We backtraced the route and I spotted my phone along the highway! It survived hitting the blacktop at 65 mph with out a scratch! The case was a little dinged up but my phone survived!
customer_reviews.author: nathan p putbrese

customer_reviews.title: Great case, but the screen protector isn’t scratch-proof
customer_reviews.text: I love that this is waterproof, easy to grip, fits in my pocket and the dash-mount holder I have, and is relatively easy to take off, if needed. Sound quality seems good, especially if you open the charger port. I was looking forward to kayaking and swimming with it! Unfortunately, the life-proof design didn’t include a scratch-proof screen. Just normal use, putting it in my purse, pocket, etc. has led to some rather deep scratches on the screen protector after just a week. I’m going to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Furtado

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I used to use lifeproof for years. Unfortunately their quality greatly declined so I switched to this brand. Couldn’t be happier. The only thing is, phone calls can sometimes be difficult due to the person on the other line having a hard time hearing me, but I’ve never had to take off the case to make a call. Overall, 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Marta Gorecka

customer_reviews.title: Must-have!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for six months, and it’s still holding up! My phone fell so many times, and not a single scratch. The audio quality is good, and I can use my finger to unlock it. The only bad thing is that I need to take out the cover to take good pictures, otherwise they look cloudy. But I’m not complaining, I love my case!
customer_reviews.author: Naomi

customer_reviews.title: Texting is too much a hassle with this case
customer_reviews.text: Hard to remove and really a hassle to txt or type anything. I have to fight with it and it’s frustrating! Half the time it doesn’t sense when I touch the screen. The unlock works just fine. But the fact that txtn is such a hassle is not worth it Returning this one
customer_reviews.author: Christina Renea DeBrouwer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable to use and passed water test with flying colors.
customer_reviews.text: Just received this so cannot evaluate completely but was easy to put on phone and seems easy to hold. Waterproof test was a success. So far only problem is that I have to push button really hard to get to my apps. Otherwise seems to be an excellent product. Don’t know about sound yet. Don’t spend a lot of time talking on phone and will remove cover regularly when not using in or around water or sand. So not worried about hearing issue. Didn’t give 5 stars because not sure about durability but seems like strong case.
customer_reviews.author: Pegd

customer_reviews.title: Damaged/ poor quality cover on home button
customer_reviews.text: Everything seemed absolutely perfect including the water test until I actually started to put my phone in the case.... While the plastic on the front and back is a thick plastic, the plastic on top of the home button/fingerprint reader is thinner than saran wrap. It WILL tear after one or two finger nail scratches. You Can see in the video that it’s also peeling off of the edge... really wanted to love this, and was looking forward to the delivery as I am a swim coach and wanted to use this new year and in the water.
customer_reviews.author: suz

customer_reviews.title: Nice good quality case!!!
customer_reviews.text: Let me just start with I purchased this case based off reviews. I have had a lifeproof case for the past two years. Its heavy and it finally broke on a fall that wasn’t even on pavement. It fell from my vent clip to the van floor. This new case is so light. It passed the waterproof test and has a very tight seal. The wristlit strap is a nice feature. The other case i dropped alot because it was heavy and hard to hold when carrying other items.
customer_reviews.author: LH69

customer_reviews.title: Passed all the tests!
customer_reviews.text: This case is much better than the other waterproof cases I’ve gotten. It passed the water test, and I also tested if it worked fine making calls. The audio wasn’t muffled on both ends and I was able to use loudspeaker and FaceTime without earphones. Both things didn’t work with my old case.
customer_reviews.author: AngelRoque

customer_reviews.title: Case Muffles Sound Significantly!
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this case, but when I put it on my phone, I noticed that the music I was listening to was extremely low. Then people were telling me that they called me, but I never heard the phone ring. The fact that your phones sound quality is diminished to almost nothing should definitely be mentioned in the phone description. I am buying a new phone case. I definitely cannot keep this one.
customer_reviews.author: Karren Ross-Fortunet

customer_reviews.title: Love this case!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this case after owning a LifeProof. So far it has lived up to the high end case for a fraction of the price. It passed the water test, fits my phone beautifully and doesn’t feel bulky in my hand. The touch screen works with no issues. So far, I have nothing bad to say. Worth the price and will protect my phone from a walking toddler!
customer_reviews.author: JillyBe

customer_reviews.title: had to take the case off every time i got a phone call
customer_reviews.text: every time i tried to be on the phone, the person i was talking to would always complain about not being able to hear me. finally i put the peices together and took the case off and they could immediately hear me better. my friend also ordered this case and said that she had the same problem. **update** the seller saw my review and immediately refunded me my money. They were very accommodating and considerate. Great experience.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Jones

customer_reviews.title: One that really works. Worked great in Hawaii!
customer_reviews.text: I’m always concerned if items like this really work with so many out there. I got this one for our Hawaii trip and it worked perfectly. In the ocean and the waterfalls while hiking. Yes, as long as you follow the instructions and double check the seal all the way around you’re good to go. Just take the time to properly check the seal and that you’ve got a good seal. 🤙🏽
customer_reviews.author: T. Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Almost loved it 💔
customer_reviews.text: First! I wanted to love this case I really did. But, it just wasn't what I personally wanted. I will use it for days at the pool or lake. Just not an everyday case for me. Likes: The case was in-fact waterproof. Directions to put the case on are very clear. Dislikes: Bulkier than I like. Once you open the charge port the space is big enough to allow dust and debris in the case. I do a lot of work with my phone and found that customers had a hard time hearing me.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Fingerprint reader not secure.
customer_reviews.text: It’s great for protecting the phone, but the plastic disc over the fingerprint reader eventually came loose and the phone no longer is completely protected. I wish they included replacements rather than have to buy a whole new case only to have the disc fall off again.
customer_reviews.author: EJZ

customer_reviews.title: Good case for $
customer_reviews.text: Shipped and received quickly, packaged well, good communication. Seems like Goodcase, passed water test no issues, phone install was extremely easy, handled couple small drops no issue (tabletop to floor). Durability only 4 stars cause case has been through worksite abuse yet so no knowledge of durability. Question ringer on off switch and USB port cover durability but only time on job will tell how well it does.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Deel

customer_reviews.title: Have had for a year
customer_reviews.text: So I have had this case for a year on my 8 plus, and I now have to get a new case. But the case is still great to use, the port cover for the charge plug broke off after a year of use, and while it still fits, the fact that it isn't attached anymore caused me to lose it. The case is wonderful, securely protected my phone through drops, water, and all sorts of other abuses. This is why I am going to replace my current case wit the same case again.
customer_reviews.author: Mgoldsack

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Case
customer_reviews.text: The pictures and measurements provided for ordering are misleading. Consequently I ordered the wrong size. It doesn't help that Apple doesn't put the specific phone model on the box making it more difficult to order accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Bill H.

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I still have to do more checking but it actually works. I did the paper test and left it in the water a little past the time and to my surprise when I pulled it out the paper was completely dry! The case was sized for an iPhone 7 Plus case not regular. Other than that I live it. And the seller was more than will to fix any problems I may have to an exchange for size.
customer_reviews.author: Rashad

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: My 13 yr. old son was wanting a life proof case but I got him this case for his iPhone 8 Plus and it’s perfect. Considering he has 2 left feet and has been known to drop his phone a time or two I feel comfortable knowing his phone is completely protected. He wanted the case in case he accidentally jumps in the pool with it so now we’re both not worried. Also, this company has the absolute best customer service I’ve ever dealt with!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin S.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased this case for ever vacation or trip that Involves water adventures. Tubing, ziplining, etc. has always protected my phone. However it effects how your heard on phone calls, makes typing more difficult, I am constantly making typos and corners and edges of my phone are hard to touch or grab
customer_reviews.author: Kasandra

customer_reviews.title: Caveat emptor
customer_reviews.text: It's a piece of junk....what I recieved wasn't what was posted....and it's not even compatible with Verizon!! They won't give me my money back...beware!!
customer_reviews.author: Slick Rick

customer_reviews.title: Excellent performance & protection !
customer_reviews.text: Excellent grip, touch-responsiveness, picture & audio clarity. 12 days on a beach vacation in hot, humid, sandy, wet conditions didn’t phase my iPhone while contained in this case. Note: speakerphone quality not good while using case, but that’s not what this case was designed for. Excellent case ! Well made ! Gets it’s intended job done ✅.
customer_reviews.author: txbella

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely incredible
customer_reviews.text: This is seriously such a steal! Its amazing quality for the price, I used this on my vacation in cancun! I went underwater in the pool and ocean! Absolutely amazing! not a drop of water got on my phone! You can even test it first using a piece of paper! Great quality for the price! Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Look for another
customer_reviews.text: It's not bad. My biggest thing I discovered like a lot have said is that it cuts the sound down and people have a hard time hearing me. Waterproof but only as long as the fingerprint film stays intact but honestly mine didn't. It probably got a puncture some how in under 2 months. Overall would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Zombie_Jane

customer_reviews.title: Great Case, Not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Case feels solid and fits perfect. Didnt think it would look this slick. If your not use to protective cases or cases on your phone at all then it might feel a little bulky but I'm use to using ottberboxes and supcase, so just to the bulky but this isn't too bad. I like the smooth square edges. Great case, not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Israel M.

customer_reviews.title: Great price, awesome case
customer_reviews.text: Typically waterproof and dust proof cases are bulky, this one is not. It is the slimmest I have ever seen and does it’s job perfectly. It is also easy to put on and take off and the touch screen works great still in it. The button to put your phone on silent is a turn dial which I thought was interesting and it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy R.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this case but so far so good! The screen is a lot brighter then when I had on a life proof case. I really like that the case where the camera is, is flat over top. My other one would collect dust and was hard to wipe out so they wouldn’t take good pictures. This case doesn’t do that at all so takes very clear pictures! I haven’t dropped it yet to give that part a review. I will update if that happens. Hopefully I don’t have too! But it’s really a good case for the money!! I would definitely refer someone to buy this case!!
customer_reviews.author: Mango family

customer_reviews.title: I like it..... a lot
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact I can now see my actual phone/color!!! it kinda sucked having such a pretty rose gold phone that I never could see because my other box wasn’t translucent. And it’s durable enough to withstand my ever so often clumsiness. The only thing I worry about is within time..... how long will the cover of the charging port last? All things considered I haven’t attempted dropping it in water but if it just so happens I can’t be sure if the phone is truly protected; I do know it’s ok I’m the shower!
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last very long.
customer_reviews.text: It was a great case then miraculously one day it ceased to hold out water. There’s no way to contact the company to talk about warranty or replacement parts so 1 star almost destroyed my phone. Less than a year now that I’ve own the case, it’s June now I’ve purchased the case in December, and the sole purpose it was purchased for no longer holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Maximilian Vreeland

customer_reviews.title: This works!
customer_reviews.text: Brought it to Aruba for snorkeling and just to protect it on the beach. Worked great just always make sure the charging port cover is closed, not a lot of water got in but did need to clean the phone one time because I forgot. The only thing I have an issue with was the strap broke and now I can’t keep it around my wrist. Great case
customer_reviews.author: john pisapia

customer_reviews.title: iPhone Ringer Switch Becomes Useless
customer_reviews.text: So the good first: An iPhone8+ fits fine and is kept dry. The fingerprint reader works great. I haven't tested the durability by unknowingly dropping it and driving an ambulance over it (twice) like I did a competitor's case (still worked, so that case is "FirefighterProof"), but it seems sturdy enough/ What you CAN'T do with the case I received is turn the ringer on and off by the switch. The round "button" that looks like a plug for headphones does absolutely nothing to operate the switch. I am stuck with using the volume control until I find something else. I'll keep this for a backup, but it won't stay primary for much longer.
customer_reviews.author: R. Kindred

customer_reviews.title: Works with proof
customer_reviews.text: Took photo in Costa Rica. Typed on the same phone. This to prove the case works and will buy again when I need a new one! - Update: 07/13/2020 So don't cliffjump with this case. Went to Paradise Cove Colorado and jumped with it while recording. landed straight in the water but the impact caused water to slip into the case and now I have to buy a new phone.. kind of upset...
customer_reviews.author: Mo Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The case is light and slim. No wifi interference. A slight sound volume reduction due to its waterproof properties.
customer_reviews.author: ohhnest

customer_reviews.title: Ehh needed a better design for sound
customer_reviews.text: Totally kills sound coming out of the phone. Sound of music is lowered like 30%. Definitely have to use speakerphone just to talk to people because you can’t hear them.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: I was surprised
customer_reviews.text: The case was great if you want to drop it off a building. BUT the home button would not work the way it should have. It’s too bad to because I really liked the case. Also the face and back had bubbles on the screens I couldn’t figure out what was going on with it. Also it just wouldn’t fit in my carhart phone pocket I carry my phone in there pretty much always. So. It may work for you but there were jut too many negatives for me to keep it so I sent it back
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Volume is an issue
customer_reviews.text: Great case the only problem is it covers the microphone and the speakers because of the waterproof piece so it makes it very hard to hear cinders and for them to hear you as well. When I had a life proof case I don’t remember this being an issue
customer_reviews.author: Frugal Shopper-Mel

customer_reviews.title: OVER 24 HOURS IN RIVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: I took a vacation to Puerto Rico and lost my phone in a river. My phone sat at the bottom of about 50/60 ft of water in a rainforest for over 24 hours. Miraculously recovered. The phone had no damage whatsoever and functioned perfectly. Literally the best $30+ I’ve ever spent in my life. I wouldn’t recommended any other case at this point. And should I lose this case. I’m more than happy to buy another!
customer_reviews.author: Ernesto Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: I Recommend This Case
customer_reviews.text: I live a fairly active lifestyle. This case is rugged and works exactly as advertised. Please be advised I've only had it for a week or two, so I can't speak in full about long-term durability, but I definitely feel this case gives LifeProof a run for their money. I've had a LifeProof case and liked it a lot. This case provides a lot of value.
customer_reviews.author: H. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Great price in comparison to a Life Proof case, got it for my husband who works in construction and is rough on his phone. Really happy with it. Only complaint it the way you have to change the volume is sort of weird, and the case muffled the volume sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Simon

customer_reviews.title: iphone 8 plus case
customer_reviews.text: I was so disappointed by the fact that the buttons on the case are hard to push. Also, the sound quality is very low so when I call people over the phone they couldn't hear me so I have to remove the case every time someone call. Finally, I got rid of the case and bought a really good one.
customer_reviews.author: Suha Alrawashdeh

customer_reviews.title: Muffled sound quality of my phone..had to remove
customer_reviews.text: This was a good quality case but completely muffled the sound quality. Also if you plan to use a screen protector in addition to this case you will have difficulty with finger recognition. Found I was pounding on the phone to get it to register. I had to remove the case and go a different route
customer_reviews.author: Be Yourself-Be Great!

customer_reviews.title: Useless phone case
customer_reviews.text: The case muffled the sound to the point that the phone is virtually useless to talk or listen to music. I don’t recommend this case and have since purchased an Otter Box. Don’t waste your money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Scott C.

customer_reviews.title: Touch screen does not work under water
customer_reviews.text: The case is indeed waterproof. If you want to take photos underwater the touch screen will not work. You can video however you must start the video before submerging the phone then stop videoing after you get the phone back above water.
customer_reviews.author: Richard W. Schleicher

customer_reviews.title: Great Case So Far
customer_reviews.text: I got this case last Thursday for my Hershey Park trip this past weekend. Thursday night I left in under water over night to ensure it would be good for the pool. It was perfect. I used it all weekend in the pool for hrs and on water rides. The case has been great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Sehoni

customer_reviews.title: Poor call quality,  but very well made.
customer_reviews.text: I love the design and weight of this case. However, no one can hear me and says it sounds like I'm under water... I guess it does its job too well and is sealed so tightly that the microphone is muffled. Quality product for sure, but makes my phone un usable. Sadly
customer_reviews.author: Mallori Upchurch

customer_reviews.title: Unacceptable!
customer_reviews.text: Product had to be returned almost immediately. Product wasn’t up to standards. Supplier says they are changing their manufacture for this product. Not made in USA.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect or maybe just waterproof and not daily use case
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it is a slim case, and it protects my device all around. However the speakers portion were covered and your audio and microphone’s capabilities were blocked off so I had to cut that portion to be able to use the phone properly
customer_reviews.author: TANIA A VALDEZ

customer_reviews.title: Kid Safe
customer_reviews.text: I have two boys under two and unfortunately my phone gets a lot of slobber and food on it! This case is great. I had an Outterbox before and the home button lost it seal :/ (twice) This case is very sleek and not bulky- which is a plus! Also like that you can see the back of the phone.
customer_reviews.author: MOMofBoys

customer_reviews.title: Can’t touch things easily
customer_reviews.text: The only problem I have is that I have to press harder on what I want to click on.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase so far...
customer_reviews.text: I have only had the case for about 3 weeks, but so far so good. Easy to use.protective. I’ve dropped my phone a few times and no issues. I tested it’s waterproof capabilities without the phone and there was no leak. I will retest it again from time to time as recommended by manufacturer. The screen cover is more scratch resistant than m6 fre was and it appears easier to keep my screen clean. As for durability, I haven’t had it long enough to say. Ask me again in 6 months and in a year and I’ll let you know. Can’t be the price for the value thus far..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for motorcycle trips.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use on my motorcycle. I use my iPhone 8plus to navigate on trips. It fits snuggly in my ram mount. I’ve used it in pouring rain on the interstate and it worked great. The touch is a finicky,but works. Seals up nice and protects my phone well.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E.

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend it ! Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Im impress with this case. Very sturdy. Volume on calls is good. I can hear them good and they can hear me good. I have not take the phone underwater yet but so far eveything about the case is great. Only thing that i have a problem is that the speaker mode does get muffle with the case but other than that its good
customer_reviews.author: franco rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: BETTER THAN LIFEPROOF!!
customer_reviews.text: This case is amazing! I had to return TWO LifeProof cases that leaked when I did the waterproof test prior to installing my phone. Didn't know where to turn. Randomly found this brand online. Not one drop of water in the waterproof test! I'm so amazed. It's actually prettier than the LifeProof too. I highly recommend this case (and I'm very picky).....
customer_reviews.author: Alison S.

customer_reviews.title: Move Over LifeProof Cases...
customer_reviews.text: I have had a LifeProof case and they’re outstanding. I knew paying $80+ is worth it, but not affordable... This $20 case is just like a LifeProof, but so far more aesthetically better. UPDATE: Only problem I ran into was the lower speakers are very low... mostly comes out of ear piece. Took down for 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Amescua

customer_reviews.title: Unable to connect to charging cable
customer_reviews.text: Cannot use with charging cable.. will not work. The space is too narrow for charging my IPhone 7... I tried several different chargers.. It’s a Great case! If you want waterproof.. it will work but just have to take it out of case when you need to charge on cable charger.. it’s a five star but not being able to use chargers, not so good..
customer_reviews.author: Stu Jacobsen

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic performance during a mud run
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case because I wanted to be able to protect my phone during and obstacle course, mud run. I was so impressed with the quality of the pictures! The case was doused in muddy water over and over and each time I wiped it off, the picture quality was still amazing. The sound for a phone call is awful, but I didn't buy the case for everyday use. I'm a happy camper. Worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Richards

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone case
customer_reviews.text: Love this case. Had one for a 6sPlus & 7splus. Lost my 6sPlus with the OTBBA CASE tubing through river rapids 1 year ago & it was recently found & sent back to me, in great working order!! So it spent a year tumbling in river rapids. Amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. James L. Baker

product_meta.title: OTBBA iPhone 7 Plus/8 Plus Waterproof Case, Underwater Snowproof Dirtproof Shockproof with Touch ID Full Sealed Cover Waterproof Case for iPhone 7 Plus/8 Plus-5.5in (Clear)
product_meta.description:
Color:Clear

OTBBA iPhone 7 Plus/8 Plus Waterproof Case 
Color: Clear 
Fit For (VERY IMPORTANT): 
1.iPhone 7 plus waterproof case 
2.iPhone 8 plus waterproof case 

Feature: 
1. The front and rear covers design can be easy installed and removed, It can still be fully sealed after many times of installation and disassembly. 
2. Compared to the past, the sound has improved. 
3. Tightly fits iPhone 7 Plus /8 Plus with no delay and no air bubbles among the screen anymore. 

Warm Note: 
- Please do waterproof test according to the user manual before putting your loved phone in. Ensuring that all the ports have been completely sealed. 
-Please review and check the user manual to ensure correct installation. 
- The original size charge cable is correct. Please pay attention to the width of your charging cable. If the width of your charging cable is longer than case's charging port, the charging cable may can't charge your phone directly. 

Package Included 
1* OTBBA Waterproof Case for iPhone 7 plus/8 plus 
1* Cleaning Cloth 
1* Lanyard 
1* User Manual
feature_bullets: 【Waterproof】: IP68 standard waterproof, submersible to over 6.5 ft deep for 2 hours. Perfect protection for underwater/swimming/diving and daily use.

【Compatibility】: Customized for iPhone 7 plus /8 plus. Precise design of each button and port based on iPhone 7 plus / 8 plus outline. All buttons and controls work perfectly such as mute, power, volume button, touch id.
【Multi- Protection】: Withstands drops from 6.5 ft high, full sealed protect your phone from shock and drop and heavy dust and dirty.
【High Quality】: Top-level TPU as manufacture material, solid and durable, protect your iphone 7 plus /8 plus from scratches.

【Transparent and Clear】: Built-in screen protector protects from scratches without compromising sensitivity or clarity. Ultra crystal clear front screen protector enables you to high-quality, high-definition photos and videos.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars3,336 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
